Name: Pixel Samurai
About the game: A journey of a lost samurai. Honor or Death! Simple Combat : unleash your katana strike and deflect incoming attacks at the precise moment. Dash and run from the samurai's attacks but do not hesitate, as it is inevitable in Pixel Samurai. Honor or Death! Five Samurai : encounter five different samurai and challenge them to a duel! Honor or Death! The technical side - Godot Engine is used for building the game, Aseprite for creating the pixel art animation and free sound effect by Generous Composers on the internet. - The project is inspired by Hollow Knight, Ghost of Tsushima and Sekiro, this is merely a student's work and I hope you would like it. <3
